name: Touch Me Not - A Dragging Journey Race Against The Time And Clock Adventure
name_original: Touch Me Not - A Dragging Journey Race Against The Time And Clock Adventure
description:
Escape the red meterors coming towards you and make the Purple meteror survive as long as possible!

20 Levels and more to come!!

[How to play]

- Drag the Purple Meteror with your finger

- Avoid the Red enemies, they kill you!

- Pick up health to survive little longer

- Pick up shield to defend yourself

Survive as long as possible!

Enjoy this game, try to beat all 20 levels and become the master!
